mapper.select: select bNo, ssId, bContent, to_char(bDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') bDate from ERRATA_BOARD order by bno desc
select SCHOOL.s_code, s_bonboo, s_gigwan, s_name, s_room from SCHEDULE_SUPERVISOR join SCHOOL on SCHEDULE_SUPERVISOR.S_CODE = SCHOOL.S_CODE where SCHEDULE_SUPERVISOR.SSID = #{ssId}
